Backstory.Title: factory worker
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did menial, unskilled work in an industrial factory. [PAWN_possessive] job also included caring for the mules and horses which transported the goods.

Backstory.Title: psychiatric patient
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life in an insane asylum. [PAWN_possessive] industrial homeworld had a poor understanding of mental illness, and [PAWN_pronoun] was treated more like an animal than a person.\n\nThough [PAWN_pronoun] eventually recovered and was released, [PAWN_possessive] experience dampened many of [PAWN_possessive] basic life skills.

Backstory.Title: human computer
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] turned out to have an excellent memory and a gift for performing complex calculations in [PAWN_possessive] head. An industrial-world dictator decided to employ [PAWN_nameDef] to keep track of [PAWN_possessive] state's finances and expenditure.

Backstory.Title: sheriff
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the law enforcer in an isolated industrial town. [PAWN_pronoun] dealt with petty crime, dispute resolution, and the occasional drunken saloon shootout.

Backstory.Title: urbworld entrepreneur
Backstory.BaseDesc: In the urbworlds, most suffer. But someone has to run the corporations.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills of the trade - greasing palms and technical analysis. [PAWN_pronoun] is a sociointellectual machine.

Backstory.Title: joywire artist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in an urbworld lab developing cutting-edge joywire software to maximize user pleasure.\n\nWhen the local government imposed harsh restrictions on joywire manufacturing, [PAWN_pronoun] began selling [PAWN_possessive] products on the black market.

Backstory.Title: mafia boss
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high-ranking member of an urbworld crime syndicate.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] bribed officials, maintained the loyalty of [PAWN_possessive] subordinates, and extracted overdue payments - by any means necessary.

Backstory.Title: urbworld drone
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a mindless construction drone on a massive urbworld. Though [PAWN_pronoun] is now freed from the brutal social experiments to which [PAWN_pronoun] was subjected, [PAWN_pronoun] remains incapable of creative thought and leadership.

Backstory.Title: urbworld rebel
Backstory.BaseDesc: Most of the people on [PAWN_nameDef]'s world gave up their individuality to join together in an online hivemind. [PAWN_nameDef] joined a rebel faction that rejected technology entirely.

Backstory.Title: caveworld illuminator
Backstory.BaseDesc: Among tunnel-dwellers, those with vision as strong as [PAWN_nameDef]â€™s are revered as sages. [PAWN_pronoun] would lead the way, marking spots to dig with bioluminescent fungus and warning others of impending danger.

Backstory.Title: colony settler
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a settler on a new colony world.\n\nSuch a life requires a jack-of-all trades at basic hands-on tasks.

Backstory.Title: deep space miner
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] did the sweaty, grimy work of pulling metal out of asteroids on a deep space rig. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] hands-on industrial skills daily - and wasn't bad in a bar fight either.

Backstory.Title: starship janitor
Backstory.BaseDesc: While other passengers pass the years between star systems in cryptosleep sarcophagi, [PAWN_nameDef] had to wake up at periodic intervals to perform inspections, check the navigation systems, and to oil the mechanoids.

Backstory.Title: castaway
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of a ship crash on an unhabited animal world. For many years until [PAWN_possessive] rescue [PAWN_pronoun] scrounged an existence out of whatever [PAWN_pronoun] could find.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] survival skills became razor-sharp, but spending so long alone severely dampened [PAWN_possessive] conversatial abilities.

Backstory.Title: taxonomist
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled between star systems, studying and classifying the plant and animal life [PAWN_pronoun] found in the hopes of creating a complete catalogue.

Backstory.Title: space tactician
Backstory.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the space navy in an unstable system, fraught with large-scale interplanetary wars. [PAWN_pronoun] turned out to have a sharp mind for battle, and became adept at commanding combat units to great effect.
